analyzer/generate-MODULES.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/bin/bash
00002 
00003 if [ $# -lt 1 ]; then
00004   echo "Usage: $0 PATH\n"
00005   echo "You must specify the path where MODULES.h should be created."
00006   echo "For example, to make ../src/MODULES.h, use "
00007   echo "  $0 ../src/"
00008 
00009   exit 1
00010 fi
00011 
00012 OUTFILE=$1/MODULES.h
00013 
00014 rm -f ${OUTFILE}
00015 while read module; do 
00016   [ -z "$module" ] &&continue;
00017   module="`tr -d '\r\n' <<<$module`"
00018   if [[ "$module" == '#'* ]];then 
00019           echo "Ignoring: ${module}"
00020           continue
00021   fi
00022   basename=`basename $module`
00023   echo "extern ANA_MODULE ${basename}_module;" >> ${OUTFILE};
00024 done < MODULES
00025 echo >> ${OUTFILE}
00026 echo "ANA_MODULE *trigger_module[] = {" >> ${OUTFILE}
00027 while read module; do 
00028   [ -z "$module" ] &&continue;
00029   module="`tr -d '\r\n' <<<$module`"
00030   if [[ "$module" == '#'* ]];then 
00031      continue
00032   fi
00033     basename=`basename $module`
00034     echo "  &${basename}_module," >> ${OUTFILE}; 
00035 done < MODULES
00036 echo "NULL };" >> ${OUTFILE}
